author: SkinnyTaste
name: Gandules Guisados

ingredients.notes: or more to taste (Better Than Bouillon)
long grain white rice for serving

instructions: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet and add the sofrito, sauté 3 to 4 minutes, stirring. Add the remaining ingredients and bring to a boil, cover and simmer 20 minutes, until the flavors meld and thicken. If you want thicker beans, uncover and simmer until thickened to your taste. For soupier beans, add more water. Serve over white rice.
